level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor may issue rules necessary to implement this subchapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of chapter, see § 2-4 of the HIV Testing of Certain Criminal Offenders Emergency Act of 1992 (D.C. Act 9-318, November 24, 1992, 39 DCR 9016).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-121, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1601.
